title: Korovka – Buy Online at GastronomUSA
text: Great service. Fast delivery. Delicious variety of favorite foods. Perfect quality. Everything arrived intact and was well packed. Thank you. Отличного качества и самый вкусный сироп топинамбура. Я использую его как более полезная замена сахара в чай и кофе. Bright, tangy, and not too sweet. The black currant flavor is bold and well-balanced. I bought it for Herring Under Fur Coat and it came out just perfect!
